entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 09:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: E 41 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to a few rain showers this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to flurries this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
